columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the training job.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the training job.

columns.name: training_job_status
columns.description: The status of the training job.

columns.name: auto_ml_job_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AutoML job.

columns.name: billable_time_in_seconds
columns.description: The billable time in seconds. Billable time refers to the absolute wall-clock time.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: A timestamp that shows when the training job was created.

columns.name: enable_managed_spot_training
columns.description: A Boolean indicating whether managed spot training is enabled or not.

columns.name: enable_network_isolation
columns.description: Specifies enable network isolation for training jobs.

columns.name: enable_inter_container_traffic_encryption
columns.description: To encrypt all communications between ML compute instances in distributed training, choose True.

columns.name: failure_reason
columns.description: If the training job failed, the reason it failed.

columns.name: labeling_job_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth labeling job that created the transform or training job.

columns.name: last_modified_time
columns.description: Timestamp when the training job was last modified.

columns.name: profiling_status
columns.description: Profiling status of a training job.

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) role configured for the training job.

columns.name: secondary_status
columns.description: Provides detailed information about the state of the training job.

columns.name: training_end_time
columns.description: A timestamp that shows when the training job ended.

columns.name: training_start_time
columns.description: Indicates the time when the training job starts on training instances.

columns.name: training_time_in_seconds
columns.description: The training time in seconds.

columns.name: tuning_job_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the associated hyperparameter tuning job if the training job was launched by a hyperparameter tuning job.

columns.name: algorithm_specification
columns.description: Information about the algorithm used for training, and algorithm metadata.

columns.name: checkpoint_config
columns.description: Contains information about the output location for managed spot training checkpoint data.

columns.name: debug_hook_config
columns.description: Configuration information for the Debugger hook parameters, metric and tensor collections, and storage paths.

columns.name: debug_rule_configurations
columns.description: Configuration information for Debugger rules for debugging output tensors.

columns.name: debug_rule_evaluation_statuses
columns.description: Evaluation status of Debugger rules for debugging on a training job.

columns.name: environment
columns.description: The environment variables to set in the Docker container.

columns.name: experiment_config
columns.description: Associates a SageMaker job as a trial component with an experiment and trial.

columns.name: final_metric_data_list
columns.description: A collection of MetricData objects that specify the names, values, and dates and times that the training algorithm emitted to Amazon CloudWatch.

columns.name: hyper_parameters
columns.description: Algorithm-specific parameters.

columns.name: input_data_config
columns.description: An array of Channel objects that describes each data input channel.

columns.name: model_artifacts
columns.description: Information about the Amazon S3 location that is configured for storing model artifacts.

columns.name: output_data_config
columns.description: The S3 path where model artifacts that you configured when creating the job are stored.

columns.name: profiler_config
columns.description: Configuration information for Debugger system monitoring,framework profiling and storage paths.

columns.name: profiler_rule_configurations
columns.description: Configuration information for Debugger rules for profiling system and framework metrics.

columns.name: profiler_rule_evaluation_statuses
columns.description: Evaluation status of Debugger rules for profiling on a training job.

columns.name: resource_config
columns.description: Resources, including ML compute instances and ML storage volumes, that are configured for model training.

columns.name: secondary_status_transitions
columns.description: A history of all of the secondary statuses that the training job has transitioned through.

columns.name: stopping_condition
columns.description: Specifies a limit to how long a model training job can run.

columns.name: tensor_board_output_config
columns.description: Configuration of storage locations for the Debugger TensorBoard output data.

columns.name: vpc_config
columns.description: A VpcConfig object that specifies the VPC that this training job has access to.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags assigned to the training job.
